attributes.action: Israeli PM. Government, military chiefs should face ICC in hague
attributes.additional_details: After World WAR Two Jewish peoples started to settle in what was then Palestine, in 1947 the UN drew up a plan to divide the land and create two nations, Palestine and Israel, with Jerusalem being a UN run zone. Shortly after Israel began forcibly inceasing it's land share, forcing palestinians to flee their homes, The UN drew up resolution 194 however israel does not recognise nor signed this resolution. , Israel has and still contiues to target the palestinian civilian population, most recently the 2008/09 israeli invasion of gaza in which israeli planes and artillery bombed houses, hospitals even a UN run school killing scores of people, israeli troops also shot and killed men, women and children in the streets, all of which was caught on video. The israeli gov, PM and military heads should be brought before the ICC in the hague on charges of war crimes, crimes against humanity, genocide and human rights abuses.
